contentList.content: The Formless Mother
Warlocks of this variety form a pact with the Formless Mother, a powerful being craves who wounds and bestows power upon accursed blood.
Mortal Reminder: Death

When you land a <LSTag Tooltip="Kill">Killing Blow</LSTag>, nearby enemies must succeed a <LSTag Tooltip="Saving Throw">Wisdom Saving Throw</LSTag> or become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.
Insight of the Mother
Sacrificed <LSTag Tooltip="Max Health">Max Health</LSTag> for +4 <LSTag Tooltip="Kill">Spell DC</LSTag>.
Insight of the Mother
Sacrifice 15% <LSTag Tooltip="Max Health">Max Health</LSTag> to gain +4 <LSTag Tooltip="Kill">Spell DC</LSTag>.
Gift of the Vile Blood
Sacrifice 10% <LSTag Tooltip="HP">HP</LSTag> to regain <LSTag Tooltip="Kill">Spell Slots</LSTag>.
Soulstealer
Whenever you deal a <LSTag Tooltip="Kill">Killing Blow</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="Max Health">Heal</LSTag> for 10 <LSTag Tooltip="Max Health">Hitpoints</LSTag>.
Invigorating Slaughter
Once per Combat, you regain 1 <LSTag Tooltip="Action Point">Action Point</LSTag> per <LSTag Tooltip="Kill">Kill</LSTag>.
Blood Blast
Launched a Blood-Formed projectile, dealing [1] and causing minor <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> on a failed <LSTag Tooltip="Saving Throw">Constitution Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Blood Shard
Launch Shards of Blood at your enemies, dealing [1] and causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>.
Swarm of Flies
Summon a swarm of flies, causing [1] and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag> to any creature caught within.
Blood Rune
Summon a Rune on the ground which detonates when an enemy steps on it, causing [1].
Vile Blood

Lash out at all enemies around, dealing [1], causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> on a failed <LSTag Tooltip="Saving Throw">Constitution Saving Throw</LSTag>.
Blood Storm

Call forth a Blood Storm, causing all caught within to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleed</LSTag>. Additionally, the storm creates a cloud of choking blood, reducing <LSTag Tooltip="Movement">movement</LSTag>, causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDNESS">Blindness</LSTag>, and dealing [1] to any creature that ends it's turn inside.
Affinity

Hurl a coagulated sphere at enemies which explodes upon impact, dealing [1] and causing <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUNDS">Gaping Wounds</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunned</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CRIPPLED">Crippled</LSTag>.
Blood Cloud
Reduced <LSTag Tooltip="Movement">movement</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLEEDING">Bleeding</LSTag>, and taking damage on turn end.
